sentences.english: Passengers shall bear responsibilities themselves in case of any consequences caused by their violation of the above regulations.
sentences.chinese: 旅客因违反上述规定造成误机等后果的，责任自负。

sentences.english: I don't think I missed the flight because of my personal reason.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为是我本人的原因导致我误机。

sentences.english: Please tell me the reason why you missed the plane.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我你误机的原因。

definition: to change one's reservation/to transfer to a different flight, airline, bus or train
not on time/late (public transport, airlines)/overdue/behind schedule/delayed
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
to bounce (a check)/to return a ticket/ticket refund
to get off a plane/to deplane
to delay/to be held up/to miss (an opportunity)/delay/holdup
jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
